      • zeroRowsAndColumns

        public static void zeroRowsAndColumns(int[][] a)
        Objective is to clear the row and columns for all the elements that are zero
        It can be achieved using two boolean arrays, one for rows and another for column.
        In the first parse, we will set all the entries in the rows and column array if the element is zero
        In the second parse, parse the rows and columns arrays. If the entry is true, that row/column is zeroed in original array.
        Parameters:
        a - Array which needs to be zeroed out.

      • isDuplicatePresent

        public static final java.lang.Boolean isDuplicatePresent(java.lang.String str)
        Question: To find if duplicate characters are present in a string.
        Solution implementing: Assuming the range is small, keep an array of booleans of 256 characters initialized to false
        Parse the string. If the index is set to false, set it to true. If it is set to true, return false.
        Parameters:
        str - String to be looked into.
        Returns:
        true if the string has not duplicates. false otherwise.

      • isAnagram

        public static final java.lang.Boolean isAnagram(java.lang.String s1,
                          java.lang.String s2)
        Problem: Given two string, find if one is permutation of other. Solution: Out of different solution, I have selected to implement it using hashmap.
        Parameters:
        s1 - First string
        s2 - Second string
        Returns:
        true if string are anagram, false otherwise

      • updateString

        public static void updateString(char[] chStr)
        Problem: Given a string, replace the spaces with %20 Approach: Count number of spaces. Start from the end+2*numSpaces and copy the characters from the end of the string. When space is hit, replace it with %20.
        Parameters:
        chStr -
